summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that exercise the mocked Amazon EKS service provided by Moto. It defines helper utilities and pytest fixtures to set up a test client, create clusters and node groups, and verify their properties. The tests cover creation, duplication handling, deletion, description, and listing of clusters and node groups, as well as proper error responses for non‑existent resources and resource‑in‑use scenarios.
business_intent: Validate that the Moto EKS mock server accurately replicates AWS EKS behavior, enabling developers to reliably test EKS‑related functionality without accessing real AWS resources.
